pullrequest.title: add filters class (split out of pull request #999).

content.raw:
I used it to filter KE and check if there's significant high frequency KE in the system.  Figured a shared class could be useful (e.g. rtf calculation).

On a side note, given the Filters class is templated, it will not work with PIMPL, is there a way around that?
content.html:
I used it to filter KE and check if there's significant high frequency KE in the system. Figured a shared class could be useful (e.g. rtf calculation).

On a side note, given the Filters class is templated, it will not work with PIMPL, is there a way around that?
